sentences.sContent: He felt utterly daunted by the prospect of moving to another country.
sentences.sCn: 他一想到要移居别的国家就感到十分害怕。

sentences.sContent: Don’t be daunted by all the technology.
sentences.sCn: 不要被所有这些技术给吓住。

words.tran: 使人畏缩的；使人气馁的；令人怯步的
无畏的；勇敢的；不屈不挠的

trans.tranOther: to make someone feel afraid or less confident about something
